project_descr: Steppe conservation and management in Kazakhstan

outputs.output_descr: The porject is aimed to achieve the following three outcomes:1) PA system of Kazakhstan contains representative samples of steppe ecosystem under various conservation management regimes and provides effective coverage of ecosystems and ecological processes;2) tools for landscape-level steppe conservation planning and management are developped and implemented by key stakeholders;3) the systemic, institutional and individual capacity for steppe conservation in a wide productive landscape is strengthened
